Class Player

java.lang.Object
entity.Character
entity.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
public class Player extends Character
Represents the main player character controlled by the user.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class entity.Character

    alive, attackPower, critChance, critDamage, defense, dodgeChance, hp, lastAttackCritical, maxHp, poisonDamagePerTurn, poisonTurns, random
